text: Auriga is a constellation in the northern sky. It is the Latin word for "charioteer" - someone who drives a vehicle that is pulled by an animal. The astronomer Ptolemy listed Auriga in the 2nd century when he was writing a list of 48 constellations. ==References== Citations References * * * * * * Category:Constellations Category:Constellations listed by Ptolemy
title: Auriga (constellation)
